data.prayer: Father, move the 40,445 believers in the county of Varanasi to say "Not our will, but yours be done", like Jesus.
data.verse: He withdrew about a stone’s throw beyond them, knelt down and prayed, "Father, if you are willing, take this cup from me; yet not my will, but yours be done."

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Varanasi, Uttar Pradesh, India
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, please make every disciple be a disciple maker, every home a training center, and every church a church planting movement in the county of Varanasi.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 90 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, we know that cultures come and go, even in the county of Varanasi, but the truth of your Word endures generations.
data.verse: Your Word, Lord, is eternal; it stands firm in the heavens.

data.prayer: Father, comfort those who mourn in Varanasi, Uttar Pradesh, India.
data.verse: Blessed are those who mourn, for they will be comforted.

data.prayer: Lord, Let your Kingdom come among the Rajput (Muslim traditions) people. Let your will be done, as in heaven, so on earth.
Father, please raise up prophets in Varanasi who can call the church to holiness and purity, preparing your church as a bride for your Son.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Jesus, defend your people in the county of Varanasi against the difficulty of these last days.
data.verse: But mark this: There will be terrible times in the last days. 2 People will be lovers of themselves, lovers of money, boastful, proud, abusive, disobedient to their parents, ungrateful, unholy, 3 without love, unforgiving, slanderous, without self-control, brutal, not lovers of the good, 4 treacherous, rash, conceited, lovers of pleasure rather than lovers of God— 5 having a form of godliness but denying its power.

data.prayer: Father, thank you that in your kindness you have made every believer in Varanasi, Uttar Pradesh, India a priest, who can offer spiritual sacrifices to you through Jesus.
data.verse: Therefore I tell you that the kingdom of God will be taken away from you and given to a people who will produce its fruit. He who falls on this stone will be broken to pieces, but he on whom it falls will be crushed.”

location.name: Varanasi
location.people_groups_list: Gadaria Dhingar, Rajbhar, Jat Dhariwal (Muslim traditions), Rajput Amethiya, Jat Deswal
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Gadaria Dhingar (1,188,000), Rajbhar (73,000), Jat Dhariwal (Muslim traditions) (1,100), Rajput Amethiya (26,000), Jat Deswal (74,000)
